channel.title: Clan chat
channel.description:
How can i get my clan Like if i make a cc its mine cc forever until i don't want it anymore. If i logg out and there is someone in the clan I'm still the owner of the clan. And so the owner can give Admin,mod and support ranks in the clan
Help me plz

item.title: Clan chat
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The best way to do this would make the clan chat data save into an external file (like a text file, or if done properly, an xml file).
As for the admin mod support ranks, if you want them to save, again ^ text files. But you could always create a new variable in the player save for your clan, and clan rank. You’d have to make sure that the person is in the correct clan for them to have a rank, and more. But these are just ideas.

Read full topic
